alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 9:31AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Meriwether, western Upson, Talbot, northwestern Taylor and eastern Harris Counties through 1000 AM EDT... At 931 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Shiloh, or 10 miles east of Hamilton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Hamilton, Talbotton, Manchester, Pine Mountain, Waverly Hall, Warm Springs, Woodland, Sunset Village, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Lincoln Park, Shiloh, Ellerslie, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Atwater, Baughville, Flint Hill, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Sunnyside, and Prattsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
